data.text: @PaavoKuronen Yes, and China’s role is not clear yet. BRIC countries may have plans behind the scenes
@annamadin Could be. If internet was to go down in the West and a "Russian Cyber Attack" was to be blamed, would Nato  join the war against Russia?

But what you may not know about 2019 was that it was during this year that Vladimir Putin signed into law a “sovereign internet” bill for Russia. This bill gave Moscow the “legal” authority to quarantine Russia’s internet from the rest of the world.
